name: Liga Intergaláctica de Magos (PT-BR)_MOHB
description:
This is our entry for LocJAM 5.

Be ready to search anatomical terms on Wikipedia, because you will need. If you're a medical student… Well, get ready to laugh.

We're going to write a bit more about our translation choices, but, for the time being, we need to rest. Just play the game!
